methods.name: new
title: Google
Cloud
Dialogflow
Sessions.new
methods.description: A session represents an interaction with a user. You retrieve user input and pass it to the Google::Cloud::Dialogflow::V2::Sessions::DetectIntent (or Google::Cloud::Dialogflow::V2::Sessions::StreamingDetectIntent) method to determine user intent and respond.

params.name: version
params.description:
The major version of the service to be used. By default :v2
is used.
